docs.snippet: Governor Lehman was announced yesterday as one of a number of public officials who will serve on the reception committee to greet delegates to the second World Youth Congress, to be held Aug. 16 to 24 at Vassar College, Poughkeepsie. The...
docs.lead_paragraph: Governor Lehman was announced yesterday as one of a number of public officials who will serve on the reception committee to greet delegates to the second World Youth Congress, to be held Aug. 16 to 24 at Vassar College, Poughkeepsie. The representatives of Chile, China, Argentina, Uruguay, Africa and the Near East are already on their way to New York.
docs.abstract: On reception com to greet World Youth Cong delegates

headline.main: LEHMAN TO GREET YOUTH; Named on Reception Group for Second World Congress

docs.snippet: Bonds worked irregularly higher yesterday in relatively quiet trading on the New York Stocx Exchange. After a brief period in the background, local traction issues staged another of their characteristic flurries as speculative interests

docs.snippet: IN "Spain Between Death and Birth" Peter Merin has produced, by using the John Dos Passos formula, an individualistic study, a biased and at times brilliant expolse of the forces that had postponed for generations Spain's conflict of liberation.
docs.lead_paragraph: IN "Spain Between Death and Birth" Peter Merin has produced, by using the John Dos Passos formula, an individualistic study, a biased and at times brilliant expolse of the forces that had postponed for generations Spain's conflict of liberation.

headline.main: Interpreting Spain's Civil War; SPAIN BETWEEN DEATH AND BIRTH. By Peter Merin. 316 pp. New York: Dodge Publishing Company. $3.
